content.title: ezyLegal with you, every step of the way
content.summary: Be it your personal or your business matters, we have covered your back. Consult a Lawyer and take the right decisions. For Legal Documents and Business Registrations, count on our network of experienced and verified legal experts spread across all major cities of the country.

testimonialData.testimonialHeading: What our customers are saying about us

testimonials.name: Abhishek Singh
testimonials.summary: ezyLegal was a game changer for us as we were starting off with our first business idea! It was easy to use with an unintimidating, friendly platform, and excellent customer service. And very importantly, the experience was smooth, and the Company Incorporation process was quick & affordable.

testimonials.name: Susan Abbot
testimonials.summary: Wow, I never thought it would be so easy to get my trademark registered. I run a bakery and I was expanding and found out that my name was used by some other shop too. I have been associated with this name for a long time and I wanted to keep the name. Good that I connected with ezyLegal and they helped me file trademark registration for my name. ezyLegal made sure I get to keep my name.

testimonials.name: Avantas Ghosal
testimonials.summary: This company is fantastic. I recommend it to everyone who is looking to form a Joint Venture or start a new business. Honestly, it's been a fantastic experience, and I couldn't be more happy with their Business Registration Services in particular.

testimonials.name: Arzoo Banaji
testimonials.summary: I had a good experience with ezyLegalâ€™s Will drafting service. I contacted ezyLegal to draft and register my will. I scheduled a call and spoke to the lawyer for 30 minutes. I received my first draft two days after the consultation. I asked them to make a few changes and the draft was finalized. They also helped get my Will registered. The service is so convenient and easy.

node.name: Business Registration
node.description: In publishing and graphic design, Lorem ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used to demonstrate the visual form of a document or a typeface without relying on meaningful content. Lorem ipsum may be used as a placeholder before final copy is available.

node.name: Limited Liability Partnership
node.shortDescription: Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) is a partnership company in which some or all partners have limited liabilities which means one partner is not responsible or liable for another partner’s negligence.

node.name: Private Limited Company
node.shortDescription: Private Limited Company is a type of company that offers limited liability or legal protection for members.

node.name: Partnership Firm
node.shortDescription: Partnership is an association of two or more people formed for the purpose of carrying on a business.

node.name: One Person Company
node.shortDescription: One Person Company is a legal entity which has only one person as a member who will act in the capacity of a director as well as a shareholder.

node.name: Trademark Registration
node.shortDescription: A trademark or service mark is a word, name, symbol, or device used to indicate the source, quality and ownership of a product or service.

node.name: Trademark Renewal
node.shortDescription: A trademark or service mark is a word, name, symbol, or device used to indicate the source, quality and ownership of a product or service.

node.name: Copyright Registration
node.shortDescription: Copyright (or authorâ€™s right) is a legal term used to describe the rights that creators have over their literary and artistic works.

node.name: Startup India Registration
node.shortDescription: Start-up is a company or project undertaken by an entrepreneur to seek and develop a scalable business.

node.name: Trade License
node.shortDescription: Trade License is a permit issued by government or Municipal Corporation granting permission to operate a particular business or trade.

node.name: FSSAI License
node.shortDescription: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) is a statutory body established by the Government of India.
